code: import React,{Fragment,useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InputTodo=()=>{const[descrriptions,setDescriptions]=useState("");const onSubmitForm=async()=>{try{const body={descrriptions};const response=await fetch("http://localhost:5300/todo",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(body)});console.log(response);}catch(err){console.error(err.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center mt-5",children:"Pern Todo List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"d-flex mt-5",onSubmit:onSubmitForm,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"form-control",value:descrriptions,onChange:e=>setDescriptions(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"btn btn-success",children:"Add"})]})]});};export default InputTodo;
